body: Where is the template to appeal an infraction?
body_tagged: Where is the template to appeal an infraction?
title: Help (Appealing infraction)

replies.body: Just say what you were banned for and why you think you should be unbanned
replies.body_tagged: Just say what you were banned for and why you think you should be unbanned

replies.body:
Hey there! There isn't any placed template or one you have to follow. But along these lines would be great!

IGN:
Reason of punishment:
Punisher:
Why you think you should be unbanned:

Good luck on your appeal!


[As this question has be answered, I will be locking it!]

Locking...
